It might not work if you don't have the original .exe in there. Before cracking the game you should have turned the original .exe into a backup file. If you did, restore that one and then run the patch program. Once its done you can use your crack again.

anybody out there looking for Star Wars - Force Commander pc game? here it is full and no install or crack needed. just extract and play. http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5887563/Star_Wars_-_Force_Commander.rar

There are 2 patches idiot. If you spend the time and actually look them up, you'll notice there is a NA version, and a Multi Language version. The NA stands for North American, and the Multi should be self explanatory.
